content: सहस्रिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Possessed of a thousand; इच्छति शती सहस्रं सहस्री लक्षमीहते <ls>Pt. 5. 82.</ls> {@--2@} Consisting of thousands. {@--3@} Amounting to a thousand (as a fine); <ls>Ms. 8. 376.</ls> {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} A body of a thousand men &c. {@--2@} The commander of a thousand.
